title: New Orleans Best Accommodations | Chateau New Orleans
text: Embrace Rest & Relaxation New Orleans Accommodations Enjoy quiet, elegant hotel rooms and suites near landmark attractions and the whirlwind of the French Quarter. With 24-hour front desk service, self-parking, a beautiful courtyard, and a serene pool you're sure to enjoy a relaxing environment during your stay. While staying in our decadently furnished rooms and suites, guests will appreciate several modern amenities like complimentary Wi-Fi, bottled water at the front desk, flat-screen televisions, hair dryers, clothing irons, ironing boards, and exceptional service from our friendly hotel staff.
